/auth.auth/email-already-in-use: The email has already been taken.
/auth.locked-data-demo: Data are locked in the demo mode.

/auth.registered-successfully: Successfully registered. You get 30 free trial days.
/auth.tagline: A simple billing tool for micro-enterprises.

/dashboard.modal-content-1: factAE is a billing tool for micro-enterprises at 1 €/month. The aim is simple: help you to manage with ease your clients, your quotations and your invoices. Nothing more.
/dashboard.modal-content-2: Before editing documents, you must set up your profile and add a first client.
/dashboard.part-a: A low VAT threshold overrun ({{value}}) may oblige you to collect VAT from your clients, depending on your previous turnover:
/dashboard.part-a-1: if your last year's turnover is lower than the low VAT threshold => not applicable
/dashboard.part-a-2: if your last year's turnover is higher than the high VAT threshold => applicable
/dashboard.part-a-3: if your last year's turnover is between the low and the high VAT threshold => check the year before last
/dashboard.part-b: A high VAT threshold overrun ({{value}}) will oblige you to collect VAT from your clients. This will take effect on the first day of the month of overrun. It also means:
/dashboard.part-b-1: to apply for an intra-community VAT number with the SIE (Service des Impôts des Entreprises)
/dashboard.part-b-2: to put the VAT on your new invoices + to re-edit all those from the month of overrun
/dashboard.part-b-3: to create a pro account on impot.gouv.fr to declare your VAT
/dashboard.part-c: A micro-entrepreneur threshold overrun ({{value}}) in two consecutive years implies:
/dashboard.part-c-1: the loss of your mirco-entrepreneur status (automatic change to the individual business regime)

/documents.conditions-subtitle: The legal mentions and conditions of payment, delivery, execution etc. that will appear at the bottom of the document.

/profile.pricing-subtitle: The hourly / daily rate or lump sum that will be displayed by default on your quotations.
